title: BEAST
description: A four day sex-fest who would've thought it would lead to such outcomes: A manic-murdering best friend, girl on girl impregnating, murder, scheming co-workers and a playa throwing in her game.Tykota Savage, a playa by all means mets her game-stopper in sexy model Toree Mikal. After an unbelivible bout of loving in it's rarest form, things take a turn from the unthinkable to the demented.Born with an extra tool, Tykota's sex game is sick. But what's even sicker is the fact that someone close to her is targeting her, Toree and their unborn child. Someone, who has left reality behind long time ago. Things heat up as Tykota race to save her family and banish this threat before it banishes them..BEAST...there's one in all of us.Can you control yours???
author: Fallon
